description:
Noted! is a Simplenote client and provides a notes app that is fast and easy to use. Note entry is simple – just tap the new note icon & start typing your note. Searching your existing notes is just as simple – just start typing and the notes list will be filtered to show only notes that contain the text you’ve entered.

Noted! syncs with Simplenote so you can get access to your notes from practically anywhere. In addition to the Simplenote web service, Simplenote clients exist on Windows, MacOS, iPhone, and Android. You’ll need a free Simplenote account to sync your notes. Access your notes on the device in Noted! while offline and sync to the Simplenote web service to access your notes from any web browser.

New version 0.2 adds the ability to use tags in your notes, display a note in list mode, and use Just Type in webOS 2.x! 

Version 0.2.6 fixes a bug in the tag filter list where some tags were not displayed.
